body_html:
OK the install succeeded. However, my original code which was running with version 0.2.0 installed using conda, is now is giving the following error:

python: symbol lookup error: /home/username/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: cudnnSetConvolutionGroupCount

I will try to post a reproducible example if I can zero it down to a specific line.
body_text:

body:
OK the install succeeded. However, my original code which was running with version `0.2.0` installed using conda, is now is giving the following error:

```
python: symbol lookup error: /home/username/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: cudnnSetConvolutionGroupCount
```

I will try to post a reproducible example if I can zero it down to a specific line.
